pageContent:
RAJASEKARAN CHELLAMUTHU 
 
  
Atlanta, GA 30045 | (858) 603-0334 | rajasekarancms@gmail.com | LinkedIn-RC 
 
    SUMMARY     
15 years of expertise in Data Migration, Data Integration, ETL, Data Warehousing and Business Intelligence. 
 
Specialized in SAP Data Services (BODS) and Syniti ADM to drive SAP S/4HANA Data Migration projects. 
Skilled in leading mapping sessions to define data conversion rules for master and transactional data, developing 
dataflows for extracting and transforming legacy data for migration. Proven ability to ensure successful Go-Live by 
completing data loading in the production and effective collaboration with cross-functional teams. 
 
Proficient in developing ETL jobs using BODS for Data Integration, extracting data from diverse sources, mapping and 
transforming data with business rules, loading data into target systems, and developing PL/SQL procedures for complex

transforming data with business rules, loading data into target systems, and developing PL/SQL procedures for complex 
Data Warehousing requirements. Experienced in SAP Datasphere (DWC), specializing in building data models for 
impactful analytics solutions.  
    SKILLS     
▪
 ETL Tools: SAP Data Services (BODS), Syniti ADM 
▪
 Databases: SQL Server, Oracle, SAP HANA, DB2 
▪
 SAP: S/4HANA, ECC, BW  
▪
 Data Migration: S/4 HANA Migration Cockpit, LSMW, IDocs 
▪
 Data Warehousing: SAP Datasphere | Data Warehouse Cloud, Snowflake, EDW 
▪
 Reporting Tools: Power BI, SAP Analytics Cloud  
▪
 Programming Languages: SQL, PL/SQL, Python  
▪
 Informatica: Power Center, IDQ, MDM Hub 
▪
 Other Skills: Data Integration, Data modeling, Data profiling, Data quality management, Master Data 
Management, performance tuning, Agile methodologies  
  
 
    EXPERIENCE     
CAPGEMINI AMERICA INC - Atlanta, GA  
Applications Consultant   07/2014 to 09/2024  
 
SAP Data Migration 
▪

Management, performance tuning, Agile methodologies  
  
 
    EXPERIENCE     
CAPGEMINI AMERICA INC - Atlanta, GA  
Applications Consultant   07/2014 to 09/2024  
 
SAP Data Migration 
▪
 Performed end-to-end data migration methodologies for SAP S/4 HANA implementations, defining data 
extraction, transformation, and loading processes to ensure seamless transitions from legacy systems. 
▪
 Collaborated with business stakeholders, functional consultants and technical teams to define data migration 
strategies and ensure alignment with business requirements and project timelines. 
▪
 Performed data profiling and quality assessments to identify and resolve data issues prior to migration, 
improving overall data reliability. 
▪
 Developed and executed data cleansing and validation procedures to ensure high-quality data for migration 
▪
 Drove mapping sessions with SAP implementation consultants and data owners, documented data mapping and 
conversion rules 
▪

▪
 Drove mapping sessions with SAP implementation consultants and data owners, documented data mapping and 
conversion rules 
▪
 Created SAP Data Services workflows to extract and transform Master and Transactional data from legacy 
systems and loaded into S/4HANA 
▪
 Converted Customer, Vendor and Material master data and migrated to S/4HANA 
▪
 Performed Mock Loads and conducted post-load data validations to ensure migrated data met business 
requirements and maintained integrity across systems 
▪
 Executed data loading through Migration Cockpit, LTMC, ensuring successful Go-Live in production 
▪
 Completed two S/4HANA Greenfield implementation and one Brownfield implementation.

Data Integration and ETL Development | BODS   
▪
 Worked with business users and technical team to analyze new requirements for integrating data from multiple 
sources across the manufacturing company to provide a complete, accurate, and up-to-date dataset for BI, data 
analysis and other applications. 
▪
 Designed and developed reusable ETL solutions to support data integration process for the client when a new 
partner is added in the business. 
▪
 Developed ETL programs using SAP Data Services (BODS) Dataflows, in-built transforms and functions, 
custom scripts, and Workflows for complex requirements to integrate and maintain data from multiple business 
operations and applications. 
▪
 Created SAP and non-SAP connections (SAP HANA, ECC, BW, SQL Server, Oracle, DB2, SFTP file server) 
from BODS repository for data extraction and loading. 
▪
 Developed ETL jobs to extract historical data from multiple sources, transformed with business rules and loaded

from BODS repository for data extraction and loading. 
▪
 Developed ETL jobs to extract historical data from multiple sources, transformed with business rules and loaded 
into SAP BW for creating BI reports. 
▪
 Extracted relevant Master and Transactional data from SAP ECC with filters and provided output dataset to 
different partners for the client. 
▪
 Led offshore team to develop ETL objects with transformation rules, reviewed the objects to ensure the solution 
is implemented to meet all the requirements. 
▪
 Managed version control of BODS objects and performed code promotions to QA, pre-production and 
production environments 
▪
 Scheduled BODS jobs to execute, sent automated notifications to users, and resolved errors and failures 
▪
 Involved in designing and configuring SAP Data Services architecture for multiuser self-service systems on 
cloud 
▪
 Created local and central repositories, configured Job Servers and assigned security roles to users, performed

cloud 
▪
 Created local and central repositories, configured Job Servers and assigned security roles to users, performed 
administrative activities on SAP Data Services system. 
 
Data Warehousing and Analytics | Application Support 
▪
 Enhanced existing data models in SAP Datasphere (DWC) for change requests and defects 
▪
 Created connections from SAP and non-SAP systems to Datasphere and imported metadata and business data 
▪
 Created Tables, Views, Analytic Models, Data Flows, Replication Flows using Data Builder  
▪
 Created Dimensions, Facts, Consumption Models and Perspectives using Business Builder 
▪
 Created connections from SAP Datasphere and exposed the data models to SAP Analytics Cloud and Power BI 
for developing data analysis reports and dashboards 
▪
 Modified Power BI dashboards to include new data fields and filters  
▪
 Trained in Snowflake architecture, Snowsight, Warehouse, data loading, unloading, transformation, data sharing 
and other features

▪
 Trained in Snowflake architecture, Snowsight, Warehouse, data loading, unloading, transformation, data sharing 
and other features  
 
 
SOFTPATH SYSTEM LLC - Atlanta, GA  
Data Quality Analyst | MDM Developer                                                                                   06/2013 to 07/2014

 Designed and implemented data quality processes using Informatica Data Quality to ensure accurate and 
consistent data across various data sources. 
▪
 Performed data profiling to assess data quality issues, identified corrective actions and communicated results to 
stakeholders by generating reports and dashboards. 
▪
 Developed and executed data cleansing routines to address identified data issues, ensuring reliable data for 
reporting and analytics. 
▪
 Developed Informatica MDM Hub solutions to create a unified and accurate view of master data across multiple 
domains, including customer, product, and vendor data.

reporting and analytics.

 Developed Informatica MDM Hub solutions to create a unified and accurate view of master data across multiple

 Collaborated with business analysts and stakeholders to gather requirements and define data governance policies

▪
 Developed data integration workflows to load and synchronize master data from various sources into the MDM 
Hub, ensuring data accuracy and integrity.

NTT DATA CORPORATION - San Diego, CA 
Senior ETL Developer | Data Warehousing Developer   08/2009 to 06/2013  
 
▪
 Designed and developed SAP Data Services, BODI/BODS jobs for ETL requirements to perform historical and 
incremental data loads in Enterprise Data Warehouse. 
▪
 Developed BODS jobs using in-built transforms, Dataflow, Workflow and custom scripts to extract, transform 
and load data through multiple layers including source, staging, conversion and target systems. 
▪
 Created databases, tables and performed database management steps using DDL, DML 
▪
 Extracted master and transactional data from multiple sources for a telecom company, transformed data and 
loaded into Dimension and Fact tables in EDW solution built on Oracle database. 
▪
 Created efficient PL/SQL procedures to achieve complex incremental data loads into Operational Data Store 
▪
 Performed unit testing in development, integration testing in QA environment using test cases and SQL queries. 
▪

▪
 Performed unit testing in development, integration testing in QA environment using test cases and SQL queries. 
▪
 Enhanced existing ETL dataflows and stored procedures to optimize performance and reduced processing time 
by 60%

 Created documentation for technical design, source-target mapping, transformation logic and business rules
